div.a: What's Going To Kill The TV Business?

div.div: The rising cost of making television and enough cord-cutters abandoning the cable bundle to blow up the business model. The first trend is happening. The second one isn't.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SPj0Or&via=Digg&text=What's Going To Kill The TV Business?

div.a: Watch President Obama Cry While Thanking His Campaign Staff

div.div: A campaign staffer caught President Obama's behind-the-scenes thank you speech.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z9kCV2&via=Digg&text=Watch President Obama Cry While Thanking His Campaign Staff

div.a: 'IT'S NOT WORTH IT': Ad Exec's Brutal Rant Before He Died Of Cancer Is Absolutely Chilling

div.div: The screed addresses the existential problem at the center of anyone's career in advertising: Can you marry art and commerce and be fulfilled as a human being?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RHqpzx&via=Digg&text='IT'S NOT WORTH IT': Ad Exec's Brutal Rant Before He Died Of Cancer Is Absolutely Chilling

div.div: 'CALL ME AND HERE IS MY NUMBER'

div.a: Ukrainian Singer Sues Over 'Call Me Maybe'

div.div: A Ukrainian singer is filing the lawsut claiming "Call Me Maybe" is a carbon copy of her song "Hunky Santa" which producers simply tweaked before adding Carly Rae Jepsen's voice.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UxNkKM&via=Digg&text=Ukrainian Singer Sues Over 'Call Me Maybe'

div.a: 7 Powerful Moments From The Sentencing Of Jared Loughner

div.div: Several victims — including Gabrielle Giffords and her husband, Mark Kelly — addressed the man who killed six and injured thirteen in Tucson in 2010.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RKVMHS&via=Digg&text=7 Powerful Moments From The Sentencing Of Jared Loughner

div.a: Pope To Join Tweeting Masses With Personal Twitter Handle

div.div: The new Twitter account will be his own, though it's doubtful Benedict himself will wrestle down his encyclicals and other papal pronouncements into 140-character bites.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PHiC4K&via=Digg&text=Pope To Join Tweeting Masses With Personal Twitter Handle

div.a: So, Did Rich CEOs Lay Everyone Off When Obama Was Elected?

div.div: Last month, CEO David Siegel, sent his employees a very ominous letter warning them that if Obama was reelected, it could "endanger your job." So did he end up firing anyone?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Uo1Ie9&via=Digg&text=So, Did Rich CEOs Lay Everyone Off When Obama Was Elected?

div.a: Generate Your Own James Bond Movies With A Single Click

div.div: Here's a diabolical machine that will allow you to generate your own Bond movie, with its characters and titles generated from previous Bond films.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SUk5p9&via=Digg&text=Generate Your Own James Bond Movies With A Single Click

div.a: Time-Lapse Video Of NYC Power Outage

div.div: This piece is meant to capture and relay the feeling of what it was like to walk around the darkened streets of lower Manhattan.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PHEBbV&via=Digg&text=Time-Lapse Video Of NYC Power Outage

div.div: JUST HOLD ON FOR DEAR LIFE

div.a: Ryanair CEO Wants Standing Room Only Cabins Because Seatbelts Are Useless

div.div: If people don’t have to be sitting, Ryanair could use all that wasted space in the cabin to sell standing room only spots in the cabin for as low as £1 to European destinations.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Tw32F9&via=Digg&text=Ryanair CEO Wants Standing Room Only Cabins Because Seatbelts Are Useless

div.div: These are the homes you wish you lived in.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TvaXCP&via=Digg&text=The Best Hi-Tech Homes

div.div: Soon our significant others will cheat on us with robots.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RKPCaA&via=Digg&text=The Future Of Sex

div.a: The Women Living In Chernobyl's Toxic Wasteland

div.div: Decades after Chernobyl's nuclear disaster, despite the severely contaminated ground, and the deaths of many fellow 'self-settlers’, a community of determined babushkas remains.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Qq8r66&via=Digg&text=The Women Living In Chernobyl's Toxic Wasteland

div.a: Is It Acceptable To Film The Bodies Of Fallen Soldiers?

div.div: To some, images of dead soldiers are a vital historical resource. To others, they are an insult to fallen heroes. So when should we be allowed to film the bodies of those lost in past conflicts?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VFTaze&via=Digg&text=Is It Acceptable To Film The Bodies Of Fallen Soldiers?

div.a: Here Is What The U.S. Thinks It Knows About China's Nuclear Capabilities

div.div: The U.S.-China Economic and Security Review Commission, which advises the US Congress, has released a draft report summarizing what it thinks it knows about China’s nuclear stocks and strategy.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SEymDf&via=Digg&text=Here Is What The U.S. Thinks It Knows About China's Nuclear Capabilities

div.div: Reading printed text is so fluid and transparent for most people that it's hard to imagine it feeling any other way. Maybe that's why it took a dyslexic designer to create a typeface that optimizes the reading experience for people who suffer from that condition.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/o2q9Sw&via=Digg&text=The Font Designed For Dyslexics

div.a: Samsung Galaxy S3 Overtakes iPhone 4S As World's Best-Selling Smartphone

div.div: After selling more than 30 million Galaxy S3s worldwide in five months, Samsung is at the top of the food chain. But the winning streak doesn’t stop there.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PGqkw6&via=Digg&text=Samsung Galaxy S3 Overtakes iPhone 4S As World's Best-Selling Smartphone

div.div: It's cheap. It's salty. It's delicious. And it's big business.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SEvS7U&via=Digg&text=Some Facts About Ramen

div.div: BILLY JEAN IS NOT THEIR LOVER

div.a: Unsuspecting Passersby Step On Pavement Squares And Reveal A Dance Party

div.div: As part of the campaign to promote Microsoft’s Windows 8, citizens of Oslo, Norway were treated to a surprise dance party whenever they stepped on a “Live Tile.”

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VHfngB&via=Digg&text=Unsuspecting Passersby Step On Pavement Squares And Reveal A Dance Party

div.div: ONE FOOT IN THE GRAVE, TWO WAYS

div.a: Meth Heads Are Robbing People's Graves

div.div: Recently, digging up dead bodies to steal their sh*t has attracted a new breed of asshole, as keyed-up meth heads have been lured out into the sticks to spend nights on end searching for ancient loot they can flog to fund their habits.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/RHNEcB&via=Digg&text=Meth Heads Are Robbing People's Graves

div.a: Space Warfare And The Future Of U.S. Global Power

div.div: The Pentagon has begun to fuse biometrics, cyberwarfare, and a potential future triple canopy aerospace shield into a robotic information regime that could produce a platform of unprecedented power for the exercise of global dominion -- or for future military disaster.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TNFtME&via=Digg&text=Space Warfare And The Future Of U.S. Global Power

div.div: There are all sorts of reasons that shoes turn ugly. And all sorts of reasons we turn to ugly shoes. Here are 50 pairs to avoid at all costs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/PZw2KM&via=Digg&text=The 50 Ugliest Shoes In History

div.a: Which State Sent The Most Racist Tweets In Response To Obama's Re-Election?

div.div: A geographic look at which states sent the most racist tweets around President Obama's re-election.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WGnRG1&via=Digg&text=Which State Sent The Most Racist Tweets In Response To Obama's Re-Election?

div.a: What To Do When You're Visited By A Copy Of Yourself

div.div: Don't worry. If you start seeing a carbon copy of yourself everywhere, there might be a good explanation for it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SP1c66&via=Digg&text=What To Do When You're Visited By A Copy Of Yourself

div.a: The Most Advanced Robotic Arm Ever Made

div.div: All you need to know: it can pour a beer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YKFEdv&via=Digg&text=The Most Advanced Robotic Arm Ever Made

div.div: PUTTING A GUN TO YOUR FACEBOOK ACCOUNT

div.a: How To Commit Internet Suicide And Disappear From The Web Forever

div.div: Sick of horribly embarrassing things showing up when potential employers Google your name? Tired of everyone knowing you live in a garden level dungeon apartment? Thankfully, it's not that hard to delete yourself entirely.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SwQgaH&via=Digg&text=How To Commit Internet Suicide And Disappear From The Web Forever

div.a: Reddit Designs A 51-Star American Flag For Puerto Rico

div.div: After more than 50 years of 50 stars and stripes, the American flag may need a slight design change.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SFtBcA&via=Digg&text=Reddit Designs A 51-Star American Flag For Puerto Rico

div.div: Think an iPhone deserves to be carried "nude" and caseless? You will change your mind after your first few dings on the new handset.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R7cceY&via=Digg&text=The Best iPhone Case (So Far)

div.a: When Does The Secret Service Stop Protecting A Presidential Candidate

div.div: Barack Obama’s win in Tuesday’s election means that Mitt Romney (whose Secret Service code name is Javelin) will no longer be entitled to government bodyguards. But when will he have to start driving himself around again?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YLofRQ&via=Digg&text=When Does The Secret Service Stop Protecting A Presidential Candidate

div.div: In an effort to provide concrete visual proof of climate change and its devastating effects, photographer James Balog set up cameras from Greenland to Alaska in order to capture horrifying—yet undeniably beautiful—time-lapse photos that reveal the unprecedented rate at which glaciers are receding.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UnnfUi&via=Digg&text=The Photographer Chasing The Ice

div.a: Chefs Take To Twitter To Protest Against An Amateur Food Blogger

div.div: It's an unedifying sight when big-name chefs gang up on a customer and amateur food blogger, but that's just what's been happening.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/T8EcgV&via=Digg&text=Chefs Take To Twitter To Protest Against An Amateur Food Blogger
